description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to support the development of MSMEs in various value chains and to improve selected processes of Guinea's investment climate

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :4.01 (a) | Description :The Recipient shall have established the Project Implementation Unit with a mandate,staffing and resources acceptable to the Association; and recruited financial management, monitoring and evaluation and procurementspecialists to be selected in accordance with the provisions Section III of Schedule 2 to this Agreement. | Due Date :31-Dec-2013
Finance Agreement :4.02 (b) | Description :The Recipient shall have established the Steering Committee in accordance with SectionI.A.3 of Schedule 2 to this Agreement. | Due Date :31-Dec-2013
Finance Agreement :V(a) | Description :No later than one month after the Effective Date, employ an accountant, an agribusinessspecialist and a rural development specialist; | Due Date :31-Jan-2014
Finance Agreement :V(b) | Description :No later than two months after Effective Date, set up an adequate accounting softwaresystem; | Due Date :28-Feb-2014
Finance Agreement :V(c) | Description :No later than four months after Effective Date, appoint an external auditor under terms ofreference acceptable to the Association. | Due Date :30-Apr-2014
